channel.title: Uhm...could this work?
channel.description:
Ok...so, i download the funscap3 source, hoping i could get it online for like...and hour and just mess around, but that didnt work out.
So, what i was wondering is, can i make it so that my brother (in the room adjacent to mine) can play on the server with me (original intentions:get a server online, but dont advertise it so my brother can play on one without having it crash, or without worrying about the high amounts of swearing)?
if so, that would be great. If not, then just close/lock this topic. Please and thank you.

item.title: Uhm...could this work?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

first, get your internet ip, 2nd, portforward(www.portforward.com), lastly, runserver.bat or compile.bat.

Read full topic

item.title: Uhm...could this work?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok 1 thing youll need a way to connect no-ip works fine but if you cant use it then both of you get hamachi from www.hamachi.cc and then start up hamachi and click the triangle and click create new network and put in something you and your brother know the name and pass you put it and tell him to click the triangle and click join network and put the name of your network and pass in his computer.then click run.bat in your server folder and tell your brother to right click copy your ip and click new server on moparscape panel and paste it in,then make sure his ports the same as the port of what the run.bat says.then you log in with 127.0.0.1 and he logs in with your hamachi ip

hope that helps

Read full topic
